Desert Fox, also known as fess fox,
is a fox  smallest in the world with
big ears and thick fur Sand-yellow color
Desert Foxes look very cute and are therefore a
target for poachers who are
sold for their fur or as pets
in an effort to protect the species  For this reason, a
nature reserve in England has
set up a Desert Fox Conservation program,
two foxes, Bascan and Llow,
traveled 2,400 km from a zoo in Hungary
to a reserve in their brother's West County.
will participate in the
country's desert fox protection program. The Desert Fox
weighs less than 2 kg and is about 20 cm tall.
But it has a pair of wings up to 15 cm large and its
adorable appearance makes the fennec fox a
fashionable pet.  However,
experts say this animal is
completely unsuitable as a pet because
it is very afraid of strangers and cannot eat
regular pet food
in captivity. Desert foxes need to be examined by
animal experts.  Learn to

educate people about
this animal for the first time in France.

cardboard material can be recycled whereby the

minimum level above the ground  30 cm helps rainwater from

about 5 tons to complete.
This new type of clean house construction helps reduce up to 72
minutes of greenhouse gas emissions compared to

Ho Chi Minh City Police safely rescued
six people trapped in a
house fire that carried the death penalty when they were only
20 years old because they were far away from the shopping street and
returned to the program.  Ladies and gentlemen, at
about 5:30 this morning, a fire broke

Chi Thanh Street, Ward 6, District 10,
Ho Chi Minh City. Six people in the house
were lucky to escape as soon as the
team received information.
Fire prevention and rescue police of District 10 police
and related units deployed to extinguish the
fire. They used a ladder truck to
access the fourth floor where trapped people were
standing outside while the fire was on fire.
started from the ground floor, all the victims
were safely rescued, including the
elderly and children, the fire was then
controlled to prevent it from spreading to the next house.
Currently, the cause of the fire is being investigated by the police.
